001
002package com.commercetools.compat;
003
004import java.net.URI;
005import java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage;
006
007import com.commercetools.api.client.ApiCorrelationIdProvider;
008import com.commercetools.api.defaultconfig.ApiRootBuilder;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
010
011import io.sphere.sdk.client.SphereApiConfig;
012import io.sphere.sdk.client.SphereClient;
013import io.sphere.sdk.client.SphereClientConfig;
014import io.sphere.sdk.client.SphereRequest;
015import io.sphere.sdk.http.HttpResponse;
016import io.sphere.sdk.json.SphereJsonUtils;
017import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpClient;
018import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.AutoCloseableService;
019import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ResponseSerializer;
020import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.oauth2.ClientCredentials;
021
022public class CompatSphereClient extends AutoCloseableService implements SphereClient {
023    private final ApiHttpClient client;
024    private final SphereClientConfig clientConfig;
025
026    private CompatSphereClient(SphereClientConfig clientConfig) {
027        final URI resolve = URI.create(clientConfig.getApiUrl()).resolve("/" + clientConfig.getProjectKey() + "/");
028        this.client = ApiRootBuilder.of()
029                .defaultClient(resolve)
030                .addCorrelationIdProvider(new ApiCorrelationIdProvider(clientConfig.getProjectKey()))
031                .withClientCredentialsFlow(ClientCredentials.of()
032                        .withClientId(clientConfig.getClientId())
033                        .withClientSecret(clientConfig.getClientSecret())
034                        .build(),
035                    URI.create(clientConfig.getAuthUrl()).resolve("/oauth/token"))
036                .withSerializer(ResponseSerializer.of(SphereJsonUtils.newObjectMapper()))
037                .buildClient();
038        this.clientConfig = clientConfig;
039    }
040
041    public static CompatSphereClient of(SphereClientConfig clientConfig) {
042        return new CompatSphereClient(clientConfig);
043    }
044
045    @Override
046    public <T> CompletionStage<T> execute(SphereRequest<T> sphereRequest) {
047        final CompatRequest<JsonNode> compatRequest = CompatRequest.of(client, clientConfig.getProjectKey(),
048            sphereRequest, JsonNode.class);
049
050        return compatRequest.send()
051                .thenApply(
052                    apiHttpResponse -> HttpResponse.of(apiHttpResponse.getStatusCode(), apiHttpResponse.getBody(),
053                        sphereRequest.httpRequestIntent().toHttpRequest(clientConfig.getApiUrl())))
054                .thenApply(sphereRequest::deserialize);
055    }
056
057    @Override
058    protected void internalClose() {
059        closeQuietly(client);
060    }
061
062    @Override
063    public SphereApiConfig getConfig() {
064        return clientConfig;
065    }
066}
